meanings.sent1: The pluckiest firefighter bravely rescued the kitten from the tree.
meanings.sent2: She was the pluckiest student in the class, never afraid to ask questions.
meanings.sent3: The pluckiest squirrel in the park fearlessly stole nuts from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: His pluckiest decision was to climb the highest mountain despite his fear of heights.
meanings.sent5: The pluckiest flower in the garden stood tall against the storm, refusing to bend.

meanings.definition: Having a bold or spirited attitude
meanings.sent1: The pluckiest explorer ventured into the unknown jungle without hesitation.
meanings.sent2: She had the pluckiest personality, always ready to take on new challenges.
meanings.sent3: The pluckiest puppy in the litter fearlessly approached the big dog.
meanings.sent4: Her pluckiest decision was to start her own business despite the risks.
meanings.sent5: The pluckiest child in the playground led the others in a game of tag.

meanings.sent1: Among the chickens, she was known as the pluckiest, always first to find the best worms.
meanings.sent2: He earned the title of the pluckiest after facing many challenges with determination.
meanings.sent3: The pluckiest of the group, she never backed down from a challenge.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the pluckiest character was the one who saved the day.
meanings.sent5: The pluckiest of the siblings, she always stood up for what she believed in.
